document_data.name: Helmsdale
document_data.mainbody: '''Helmsdale''' was a small farming town found in the [[Duchy of Soravia]] in [[Damara]].
document_data.Geography: Helmsdale rested on the banks of the [[Goliad River]] south of [[Ironspur]] near Soravia's border with [[Brandiar]].
document_data.Inhabitants: This small farming community hosted a population of 500 inhabitants who produced food in support of the [[dwarves]] of Ironspur. The population swelled to 4,000 when Zhengyi's forces occupied the town. Only 78 of the original inhabitants survived to see the Witch-King's defeat. Most of these folk remained stubbornly determined to stay and make a living in the village.
